com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.media

Interface MediaContract

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EntityContract, FilterableService<MediaContract>, JerseyFilterableService<MediaContract>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MediaExceptionProcessor, MediaRestProxy

    public interface MediaContract
extends JerseyFilterableService<MediaContract>, EntityContract
    Contract for interacting with the back end of Media Services

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WritableBlobContainerContract createBlobWriter(LocatorInfo locator)
      Creates an instance of the WritableBlobContainerContract API that will write to the blob container given by the provided locator.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.microsoft.windowsazure.core.pipeline.jersey.JerseyFilterableService

      • Methods inherited from interface com.microsoft.windowsazure.core.FilterableService

    • Method Detail

      • createBlobWriter

        WritableBlobContainerContract createBlobWriter(LocatorInfo locator)
        Creates an instance of the WritableBlobContainerContract API that will write to the blob container given by the provided locator.
        Parameters:
        locator - locator specifying where to upload to
        Returns:
        the implementation of WritableBlobContainerContract
